task.summary: Default task
DungeonButtonEvents - beginning of Monster Round in the Initiative Order
Dungeon GUI - repaired the animations on hit and on miss
Encounter Manager - some methods were refactored from ButtonEvents class
Encounter Manager - inserting monster round into the initiative tracker, part 1
Encounter Manager - initiative order works and takes monsters into consideration
Monster AI - mock methods were created and aggression stat was introduced.
Monster AI - aggression roll is being made and distance now influences the aggression results
added new todos and changed some minor things.
Encounter and Daily Power now lock after being used. Unlocking at the next encounter is still TBD
Encounter initiative queue solved, bug fixed.
Encounter Manager - encounter powers now reset after end of encounters, daily powers reset at every three encounters
Hero powers added - daily powers updated up to Paladin
Minor corrections and todos ordering
Encounter Manager - attacking now uses the "AttackResults" class.
Encounter Manager - AoE attacks now function correctly. HP will have to be set for heroes
Encounter Manager - Single target attacks have been debugged
HeroPower Field Encapsulation, methods determining numbers of creatures hit were refactored into HeroPower class
Minor refactor and encapsulation, added a CursorManager class with methods that change the cursor.
Dungeon GUI - further refactoring, visuals on using ranged powers and burst powers are now working, but too slow.
Dungeon GUI - Range indicator is now faster on long ranges, GUI of indicator is now working better, AoE damage now functions correctly
FieldColors - enw class with static styles for button colors
HeroAttack - burst attacks can now target floor tiles and splash onto nearby creatures. Something is still buggy though
Beginning of SQL refactoring into JSON readers
Heroes are now read from JSON files. Saving heroes to JSON files still TBD
Heroes are now saved into the JSON file and being read from them as well
Fixed a bug with AllHeroNames JSON being incorrectly written
Fixed a bug with AllHeroNames JSON being incorrectly written
HeroPower - fixed a small bug that caused the burst attack to calculate number of hit creatures incorrectly.
Item management changed to JSON
Item Overwriting Changed to JSON
JSON management should work just fine right now.
New ToDos, minor cleaning.
StackOverflow Exception when selecting a single hero for the dungeon has been fixed.
Item Shop has been also changed to using JSON
Cleaned ToDos, added new ToDos
Added a button that changes the console size
Armor Items have been completed together with some images (these are to be replaced in the future)
Item Factory updated with the new armors
ItemShopGUI - corrections to some bugs with buying items, minor GUI remodelling and bug fixes.
Equipment GUI - after moving an item onto a different item, it no longer overwrites it but reverts the drag and drop events.
Dungen GUI - blood droplets image is now applied onto the bloodied creatures.
Added inheritance hierarchy to some classes, started making the monster animation on monster round.
Monster animations are now triggering upon monsters having their round. The whole thing is laggy though
Monster animation - fixed the lag by deleting thread.sleep, duh.
OnHeroClickAnimation changed so that it only triggers once during the AnimationTimer
Monster AI - monsters are now able to attack a hero when i melee range.
Added inheritance to some classes and encapsulated some fields.
Starting of the distance checking method for monster AI
Monster AI - Distance checker for AI added
